content.question: Which of the following voice-leading errors occurs in the progression above?

choices.label: Improper resolution of the Ⅰ64 chord
Improper doubling of the Ⅰ64 chord
Incorrect metric position of the Ⅰ64 chord
Incorrect spacing of the Ⅰ64 chord

content.answer: Improper resolution of the Ⅰ64 chord

unit.text: 5: Harmony and Voice Leading II - Chord Progressions and Predominant Function

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in notated music.
